organizer.name: Organizer
organizer.description: Organizer of the conflict; sets skills and type

omniscient.name: Omniscient Observer
omniscient.description: Can see both side's choices as they make them

observer.name: Observer
observer.description: Can see only what is publicly revealed

side-a-member.name: Member of Side A
side-a-member.description: Participates for side A, but does not make choices

side-b-member.name: Member of Side B
side-b-member.description: Participates for side B, but does not make choices
